item.title: 美国就业与工资增长趋缓
item.description: 6 月份，美国雇主可能放缓了招聘步伐，同时工资增长也有所放缓，这对杰罗姆-鲍威尔和他的美联储同事们来说又是一个有利的发展，他们正在寻求更多关于通胀放缓的证据。【原文：US employers probably tempered their hiring while wage growth moderated in June, another favorable development for Jerome Powell and his Federal Reserve colleagues seeking more confirmation that inflation is slowing.】

item.title: CLO 钱太多，没东西可买了
item.description: 1.3 万亿美元的担保贷款义务市场即将成为其自身成功的牺牲品，因为管理者无法以足够快的速度创造出满足需求的债券，并且正在耗尽可购买的东西。【原文：The $1.3 trillion collateralized loan obligation market is about to become a victim of its own success because managers can’t create the bonds fast enough to meet demand and are running out of things to buy.】

item.title: 谁有可能赢得伊朗总统宝座？
item.description: 一名改革派和一名保守派将在 7 月 5 日举行的伊朗总统第二轮选举中对决，此前两人在 6 月 28 日的第一轮选举中均未赢得多数票。总统易卜拉欣-莱西（Ebrahim Raisi）在直升机坠毁事件中丧生后，伊朗举行了这次投票。虽然伊朗的最高权力掌握在最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊手中，但总统有时也可以通过民众支持、政治派别和与强大机构的联系来影响政策。此次投票正值【原文：A reformist and a conservative will face each other in a runoff election for Iran’s presidency July 5, after neither won a majority in a first round June 28. The vote was called following the death of President Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash. While ultimate power in Iran rests with the Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, the president can sometimes influence policy by drawing on a base of popular support, political affiliations and links to powerful institutions. The vote comes at a tim】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚将向旱灾严重的赞比亚出售 65 万吨玉米
item.description: 在厄尔尼诺现象给邻国赞比亚带来严重干旱之后，坦桑尼亚将向该国出售 65 万吨玉米。【原文：Tanzania will sell 650,000 tons of corn to Zambia after El Niño brought a severe dry spell in the neighboring country.】

item.title: 心灵鸡汤》申请破产保护
item.description: 心灵鸡汤娱乐公司（Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment Inc.【原文：Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment Inc. — the seller of self-help books, film and television content — filed for bankruptcy after failing to outrun a heavy debt load.】

item.title: 美航前首席执行官在欺诈案调查中被西班牙警方释放
item.description: 美亚集团（Americanas SA）前首席执行官米格尔-古铁雷斯（Miguel Gutierrez）因在巴西零售商数十亿美元的会计欺诈案中扮演了重要角色而被拘留，星期六在马德里被西班牙警方释放。【原文：Miguel Gutierrez, the former chief executive officer of Americanas SA, was released by Spanish police in Madrid on Saturday after being detained as part of an investigation over his role in the multi-billion dollar accounting fraud at the Brazilian retailer.】

item.title: 无聊 "的比特币使周末交易量降至历史最低点
item.description: 根据加密货币研究公司 Kaiko 的数据，今年周末交易比特币的比例已降至 16% 的历史最低点。【原文：The proportion of Bitcoin traded over weekends has declined to an all-time low of 16% this year, according to cryptocurrency research firm Kaiko.】

item.title: 肯尼亚食品价格上涨，通胀率接近四年低点
item.description: 由于食品价格上涨较为温和，肯尼亚的年度通货膨胀率在 6 月份降至近四年来的最低点，这为因生活成本高昂而日益感到沮丧的消费者提供了一些喘息的机会。【原文：Kenyan annual inflation eased to an almost four-year low in June as the rise in food prices was more benign, providing some respite to consumers who have become increasingly frustrated by the high cost of living.】

item.title: 国内供应充足，俄罗斯延长汽油出口许可
item.description: 由于国内市场供应充足，俄罗斯将允许本国炼油厂继续出口汽油一个月。【原文：Russia will allow the nation’s refineries to continue exporting gasoline for another month as the domestic market remains well supplied.】

item.title: 中国高尔夫球车涌入美国，呼吁征收 100%关税
item.description: 美国最大的两家高尔夫球车生产商正在请求缓解生存危机：中国进口产品的大量涌入。【原文：The two largest golf cart producers in the US are asking for relief from an existential hazard: a flood of Chinese imports.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将削减制药投入税以促进生产：有线电视
item.description: 据《电缆报》援引卫生部长穆罕默德-阿里-帕特（Muhammad Ali Pate）的话报道，尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）取消了对进口药品投入的征税，以促进本地生产。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu removed taxes from imported pharmaceutical inputs in a bid to boost local production, The Cable newspaper reported, citing Health Minister Muhammad Ali Pate.】

item.title: 选民对经济感到不安或忧虑"：华尔街周刊
item.description:
Evercore公司的罗杰-奥特曼（Roger Altman）表示，尽管拜登的业绩记录良好，但选民仍对经济感到担忧

。【原文：

Evercore’s Roger Altman says voters are worried about the economy despite Biden’s positive track record

】

item.title: 狂热的上半年过后，股市将何去何从？五张图表
item.description: 人工智能的蓬勃发展推动了美国股市上半年的高歌猛进，交易员们预计今年下半年美国股市也会如此，而且还会更多。【原文：A boom in artificial intelligence fueled a blistering first half for the US stock market, and traders expect to see the same — and more — in the remainder of the year.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织将海关法改革纳入乌克兰计划要求
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）将增加一项要求，要求乌克兰修改海关法，以加大打击腐败的力度。【原文：The International Monetary Fund will add a requirement for Ukraine to implement changes to its customs code in a bid to step up a crackdown on corruption.】

item.title: 中国通过新法规加强稀土管理
item.description: 中国批准了第一部关于稀土矿开采、金属冶炼和流通的综合性法规，从而加强了对稀土行业的管理。【原文：China tightened the management of its rare earths industry with the approval of the first comprehensive regulation governing the mining, metal smelting and circulation of the mineral.】

item.title: 热带风暴贝里尔将于下周威胁加勒比群岛
item.description: 美国国家飓风中心表示，热带风暴贝里尔已在巴巴多斯以东的大西洋中部形成，并将于周日成为 2024 年的首个飓风。【原文：Tropical Storm Beryl has formed in the central Atlantic Ocean, east of Barbados, and is set to become 2024’s first hurricane by Sunday, the US National Hurricane Center said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼称通胀粘性被低估普尔索
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）在接受智利《LT Pulso》杂志采访时警告说，人们对通货膨胀的顽固性估计不足。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann warned that inflation’s tenacity is being miscalculated, according to an interview with Chile’s LT Pulso.】

item.title: 法院批准亿万富翁阿加瓦尔开采赞比亚矿山的计划
item.description: 韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）可以收回对赞比亚孔科拉（Konkola）铜矿项目的控制权，因为法院批准了一项清偿该矿债权人债务的计划。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd. can take back control of the Konkola copper project in Zambia after a court sanctioned a plan to settle debts owed to the mine’s creditors.】

item.title: 马克龙进入大选对决，勒庞看似难以击败
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙号召法国人民 "书写历史 "的号召将在周日成为现实，届时选民将前往投票站参加第一轮立法选举。【原文：Emmanuel Macron’s rallying call to the French people to “write history” will become a reality on Sunday when voters head to polling stations for the first round of legislative elections.】

item.title: 毛里塔尼亚将成为天然气生产国，领导人寻求连任
item.description: 毛里塔尼亚现任总统很可能在周六举行的选举中获得连任，这将为投资者提供一个保证，确保这个即将成为天然气生产国的欧盟盟国的政策连续性。【原文：Mauritania’s incumbent president is likely to secure a second term in elections on Saturday, providing investors with an assurance of policy continuity in a European Union ally that’s on the cusp of becoming a gas producer.】

item.title: 把握英国大选的股票交易指南
item.description: 随着反对党工党准备上台执政，住宅建筑商、能源公司和一家拥有 500 年历史的邮政公司成为受英国 7 月 4 日大选结果影响最大的股票。【原文：Homebuilders, energy companies and a 500-year-old postal firm are among the stocks most exposed to the outcome of Britain’s July 4 election as the opposition Labour Party prepares to take power.】

item.title: 越南航空获得贷款延期以避免破产风险
item.description: 据来自越南国会的消息称，越南国会批准将越南航空的 4 万亿盾（1.57 亿美元）国家担保贷款延期至 2027 年 7 月，以使这家陷入财务困境的国家航空公司有时间重组其业务。【原文：Vietnam’s National Assembly approved an extension for Vietnam Airlines’ 4 trillion dong ($157 million) state-backed loans through July 2027 to give the financially struggling national carrier time to reorganize its operations, according to information from the parliament.】

item.title: 德里机场灾难引发对莫迪建筑狂潮的担忧
item.description: 在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）斥资数十亿美元改善全国交通状况之际，印度最繁忙的机场发生了致命的屋顶坍塌事故，这是该国近期一连串基础设施灾难中的最新一起，引发了安全问题。【原文：The deadly roof collapse at India’s busiest airport is the latest in a string of recent infrastructure disasters in the country, raising safety questions as Prime Minister Narendra Modi spends billions of dollars to improve transportation across the country.】

item.title: 越南经济增长因贸易和外国直接投资而超出预期
item.description: 受贸易复苏和外商投资推动商业活动增加的影响，越南第二季度的经济增速超过预期。【原文：Vietnam’s economy accelerated more than forecast in the second quarter, buoyed by a recovery in trade and increased business activity aided by foreign investment.】

item.title: 澳大利亚总理称傲慢的 Meta 应为新闻付费
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞（Anthony Albanese）称社交媒体公司傲慢且不负责任，因为政府要求 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese called social media companies arrogant and irresponsible, as the government’s battle to have Meta Platforms Inc. continue to pay local media organizations for content escalated.】

item.title: 机器人开始从事亚洲最脏的农活之一
item.description: 在马来西亚一个潮湿的早晨，一架无人机在树丛间嗡嗡作响，监测油棕果的成熟情况。自动驾驶卡车在广阔种植园凹凸不平的地面上隆隆驶过，铺设肥料，拾起密密麻麻的收获果穗。【原文：A drone buzzes between trees on a humid Malaysian morning, monitoring the oil palm fruits as they ripen. Self-driving trucks rumble over the vast plantation’s uneven ground, laying fertilizer and picking up the densely packed harvested bunches.】

item.title: 战争疲劳来袭，俄罗斯商品流入新加坡
item.description: 两年多前，俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后，许多国家和公司都回避与俄罗斯做生意，但俄罗斯制造的商品，从发制品到巧克力，却在新加坡的虚拟超市货架上大打折扣。【原文：Heavily discounted Russian-made goods, from hair products to chocolate, are finding their way onto Singapore’s virtual supermarket shelves even as many countries — and companies — shun doing business with the nation following its invasion of Ukraine more than two years ago.】

item.title: 英国能源公司反对为新客户提供更低价优惠的计划
item.description: 英国能源供应商和消费者保护组织正敦促监管机构维持在能源危机期间为帮助稳定市场而出台的禁止向新客户提供更便宜电价的规定。【原文：UK energy suppliers and consumer-protection groups are urging the regulator to maintain a ban on cheaper tariffs for new customers that was introduced during the energy crisis to help stabilize the market.】

item.title: 米莱改变阿根廷计划第二阶段的政策
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的政府周五开始实施其所谓的第二阶段经济计划，宣布将把中央银行持有的纸币换成新的国债，目前政府仍在与私人银行谈判新国债的条款。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei’s administration embarked on what it called the second phase of its economic plan Friday by announcing that it will swap out notes held at the central bank for new Treasury debt that it’s still negotiating the terms of with private banks.】

item.title: 贝莱德宣布在封闭式基金与萨巴基金的斗争中获胜
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）宣布在与 Boaz Weinstein 的 Saba Capital Management 长达数月的代理权争夺战中取得胜利，称五只封闭式基金（总金额达 80 亿美元）的持有人拒绝了激进分子要求终止该公司投资顾问资格的努力。【原文：BlackRock Inc. declared victory in its months-long proxy battle with Boaz Weinstein’s Saba Capital Management, saying holders of five closed-end funds with a combined $8 billion rejected the activist’s effort to terminate the firm as investment adviser.】
